events.message: The insured contacted us to report a car collision that occurred downtown yesterday afternoon involving their vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the incident description and keywords.
An agent has been assigned to the case to provide direct support and gather all necessary details from the customer.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer was informed of the claim reference number for future correspondences.
We requested copies of the police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and any medical reports related to injuries.
The insured submitted all requested documentation including photos of the car damage and the official police report.
An investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has been initiated by our claims adjuster.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and damages are covered under the policy terms.
A settlement proposal detailing the reimbursement amount for vehicle repairs has been sent to the policyholder.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the handling process and the proposed settlement offer for the accident claim.
The claim has been approved by the claims manager following final review of all documents and investigation results.
The payment covering the vehicle repair expenses has been successfully issued to the insured's bank account.
The case has been officially closed with all financial transactions completed and confirmation sent to the policyholder.
The documentation and claim records were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
